item.title: CDC3_Host
item.description: Quick Summary This document describes the architecture of the CDC3 Host Interface, where the platform for execution is a Linux box. ‘Interface’ is a physical USB connection between the Linux box and the CDC3 Control Processor. The Host Interface implements a fairly standard packet exchange mechanism, where data packets of size LESS THAN 256 are exchanged with the CDC3 Processor. serial_recv Module The serial_recv Module accepts input packets from the CDC3 Processor, and then routes them forward to other modules to do the actual work that is requested.
